Package scs3grp5.ui.ulti

Class PrintHelper

java.lang.Object
scs3grp5.ui.ulti.PrintHelper
public class PrintHelper extends Object
A class that contains static strings constants and static prints functions to be used throughout the UI program
Since:
2023-11-26

  • Method Details

    • fillUpSpace

      public static String fillUpSpace(String string, int numberOfSpace, int minNumberOfSpaceOnBothEnd, boolean centralise)
      This method is static and returns the string with the necessary amount of space to format the printing of the UI
      Parameters:
      string - the initial string to print
      numberOfSpace - the total number of space that the return string should have
      minNumberOfSpaceOnBothEnd - the minimum number of space at both extreme end of the string
      centralise - true if the string should be centralise in the center else the string should be at the left most
      Returns:
      the string with the appropriate amount of spaces

    • breakDownString

      public static ArrayList<String> breakDownString(String string, int maxlength)
      This method is static and it breaks down the string to the bits of strings in the appropriate size, the bits of strings then is added to the return ArrayList in order
      Parameters:
      string - the initial string to be broken down
      maxlength - the max length the bits of strings can take
      Returns:
      the ArrayList containing the bits of strings in order
